channel.title: [530] Xenorune
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b]Xenorune[/b][/size][/center]
You might've seen this project elsewhere, but i'd just thought i'd post it here so that the guys on moparscape also know it's coming :o.
[b]Intro.[/b] Ok, lets cut the bs, it's time for a serious 500+ project, 500s have been out for 16 months now and there hasn't been one decent hosted server, and the future looks bleak project-wise. 90% of projects either a) Have no substance to them (just PKing) or b) Don't have clipped walking (who can take a project like that seriously?), or c) The owner has no interest in hosting. I'm not a big fan of project topics, i think they overhype projects and create exaggerated expectations, but someone has to do something to prove that a good 500+ server can, and will be made.
I started this server back in july but was forced to quit it for the unforseeable future, but in the last month or 2 i have decided to get a move on and develop it upto the point where it rivals good 317 servers.
As mentioned above, i plan to create the first 500+ server which rivals the top ranked 317 servers feature-wise, yeah it sounds a mammoth task, and most servers fail because they set huge goals and a few weeks later realise they can't reach those goals..so the project dies, but i've learned if you take things 1 step at a time and finish what you're doing 100% before you move onto the next thing, you will eventually get it done, i'll try not to let this project die since i want to prove that a good 500+ is better than a good 317. But if it should die, i'll most likely just release the source.
[b]FaQ.[/b] [I]What version is the server?[/I] The server is based on the #530 RuneScape client version - there are no significant differences between 525 and 530, for those that are wondering.
[I]What base server are you using?[/I] I started out with the 525 version of RS2HD i released, which is a very early version of the 508 RS2HD developed by Graham. Every in-game feature is developed by me.
[I]Can i apply for BETA?[/I] I don't really believe in BETA for RSPS..but if i do have one, it will be available for everyone, not just a select few.
[I]Can i join your team?[/I] Nope.
[I]Can you help me with/give me X?[/I] No!, please stop asking me, i spent quite a bit of time getting things other servers don't have, so my server can be unique from the rest (since hosting an RSPS is just one big competition). Please don't even ask for a tip on how to get anything i have because your efforts will be wasted.
[b]Aims.[/b] This server will be developed to be a 'RuneScape' type server (challenging experience rates, hard to gain items etc..pretty much what is known as an 'economy' server), i want the player to feel like their time isn't wasted on this server and that they can log off and it'll still be online for them to play next week as well as being fun to play.
Here is just a small list of what [I]i would like[/I] to have when i am finished (subject to change lol).
[ul][*]Awesome PvP, PvN and NvN combat. [*]All skills except Hunter, Summoning and Construction working as good as they can on an RSPS. [*]Multiple quests, some reap big rewards, others simply pass time. [*]Achievment diaries, which force you to move around the world. [*]Pest Control minigame. [*]Castle wars and Fight pits minigames. [*]Duel Arena, with item staking (no limits). [*]Barrows minigame. [*]Fight cave minigame. [*]None of the annoying bugs that are in lots of 317 servers. [*]Clan chat & Quick chat. [*]Grand Exchange with my own little twist on it. [*]Boss monsters, such as GodWars, DK, KQ, KBD. [*]Clue scrolls [*] - Pretty much anything else i forgot.[/ul]
So yeah, a pretty unrealistic list there many would say, but we shall see won't we, all i know is if i reach even half my goals then you guys will have atleast a decent RSPS to play, so what harm is there in keeping an eye on this topic and seeing how it comes along?
[b]Pictures.[/b] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/1679/image1pt.png[/img] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/4623/image2bf.png[/img] [IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/5994/image3ca.png[/img] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/2661/image4mm.png[/img] [IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/8358/image5fm.png[/img] [IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/5836/image6bf.png[/img] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/1686/image8k.png[/img] [IMG]http://img697.imageshack.us/img697/2024/image9d.png[/img] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/4561/image10nv.png[/img] [IMG]http://img121.imageshack.us/img121/7378/image11qg.png[/img] [IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/6523/screenshot070e.png[/img] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/4339/image13x.png[/img] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/5117/image14.png[/img] [IMG]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/6254/image15.png[/img] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/6825/screenshot004je.png[/img] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/8551/screenshot002ny.png[/img] [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7180/screenshot003eb.png[/img] [IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/5296/screenshot006d.png[/img] [IMG]http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/276/screenshot007y.png[/img] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/3214/screenshot008s.png[/img] [IMG]http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/8849/screenshot114.png[/img] [IMG]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/659/screenshot116s.png[/img] [IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/7778/image17n.png[/img] [IMG]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/3678/image13a.png[/img] [img]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/6682/screenshot014z.png[/img]
[B]GODWARS IS UNFINISHED[/B] [IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/3756/screenshot128.png[/img] [IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/8608/screenshot130z.png[/img] [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/8175/screenshot136v.png[/img] [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/5808/screenshot132.png[/img]
[b]Current Features.[/b] If something isn't mentioned here and it is obvious...it's because it is obvious! [B]All make 1-5-10-X-All options work unless otherwise stated.[/B]
The current features the server has :-
[ul][*]Banking - Bank pins same as RuneScape, random numbers, choose between 3 or 7 day recovery delay.
[*]Shopping - Nothing special, main stock with infinity amounts, and player stock (not like current RS shops).
[*]Trading - X'ing out, getting attacked or opening/closing another interface will cancel the trade and both parties will get their items back.
[*]Fletching skill - Arrow shafts. - Shortbows (strung and unstrung). - Longbows (strung and unstrung). - Make bolts. - Crossbows (I only did 1 c'bow handle..having 7 different handles aswell as 7 different limbs is too extreme for an RSPS). - Make arrows.
[*]Herblore skill - Identifying herb -> Adding the herb to the water -> Addings the second ingredient to the mixture. - Same mixtures as RuneScape. - Grindable secondary ingredients. - Filling vials with water (continuously). - Adding the herb to the water. - Mixing doses of 1,2,3 together. - Emptying potions.
[*]Mining skill - All rocks mine-able. - Prospecting all rocks. - Rocks have different spawn times, depending on the ore they contain. - Random gems from mining rocks. - Pickaxe affects time taken to mine.
[*]Smithing skill - All RuneScape's items from Bronze to Rune. - Smiths just like real RuneScape. - Forge ring prevents iron from 'getting lost in the furnace', 40 charges. - Full smelting available too.
[*]Runecrafting skill - Only normal runes craftable (no combo or Ourania altar). - Complete working Abyss. - All Abyss obstacles. - Fully functional pouches. - Tiaras. - Talismans, with Locate option. - Multiple rune creation, depending on level. - All altars available
[*]Prayer skill - All bones buryable. - Complete prayer switching.
[*]Cooking skill - All meat & fish cookable (other items wouldn't be used :\). - Can cook on any fire or stove. - Cooking gauntlets affect burn rate. - Level affects burn rate.
[*]Woodcutting skill - All trees choppable. - Respawn time varies depending on log type. - Nests drop from trees, may contain seeds or jewellery, nest to be used in Herblore. - Axe affects time to cut the tree.
[*]Thieving skill - All stalls thievable. - Stall respawn time varies depending on xp reward. - Same NPC's thievable as real RuneScape. - Level affects rate of being caught. - Ardougne & wilderness chests also thievable.
[*]Fishing skill - All fish fishable. - Different fishing spots for different types of rod/net, but possible to catch more than 1 fish at 1 spot (such as salmon & trout). - Your level affects what you catch. - Level affects rate of catching. - Fishing guild for level 75+ fishers.
[*]Firemaking skill - All logs from normal to magic. - Coloured logs. - Fires can be cooked on. - Ashes once burned out. - Fires viewable by all players, including ones just logging in.
[*]Crafting skill - Clay crafting. - All normal leather items. - All Dragonhide items. - All jewellery. - Gem cutting. - Flax & Sinew spinning. - Tiara & unholy symbol spinning. - Glass crafting.
[*]Magic (incomplete) - All teleports (normal & ancients) same as RuneScape. - Home teleports for all 3 magic books. - Autocasting, and defensive autocasting on players and NPCs. - All normal magic spells, and all ancient magic spells, castable on players and NPCs. - Teleblock. - Casting a spell whilst in melee combat will wait until your current attack is over before casting (like RuneScape).
[*]Farming skill - Vegatable, flower, herb, tree & fruit tree patches ( Didn't bother with others since they wouldn't be used.) - Patches yield same amount of harvest as RuneScape, to keep prices stable. - Didn't bother with diseasing/dying since it's just an un-needed 'annoyance', but can be enabled at a later date. - All grow times are X of RuneScapes, aswell as XP being X of RuneScape's (XP + grow times undecided). - Seeds gained from thieving, monster drops, nests and Miscellania coffers. - Patches grow whilst you are offline. - All plants have the same number of 'stages' of growing as RuneScape.
[*]Agility skill - Gnome training course. - Barbarian assault course. - Wilderness agility course. - Ape Atoll NOT available, couldn't get the zipline like RS so i'm not having it. - All shortcuts which could be used on Xenorune are available, providing you have the correct Agility level. - All correct animations. - Complete Brimhaven Agility Arena (more below). - Agility level affects the rate your energy depletes AND the rate you regain it. - Didn't make obstacles 'failable' since it's just an annoyance.
[*]Slayer skill - 5 Slayer masters, in the same places as RuneScape. - Different level requirement for each Slayer master. - Slayer Gem. - Slayer ring teleports you to the 5 main Slayer areas. - Relevant items needed to defeat/fight a monster. - Slayer level-specific drops (such as Abyssal whip, Granite maul etc). - Talk to Turael to cancel your task. - Black mask gives more damage against Slayer tasks. - Asking for a 'tip' will tell you where to find the monster and whether any special equipment is needed. - Slayer point system. - Recieve a set number of points per task, amount depenable on Slayer master. - Reassign mission - will cancel your task & give you a new one (monsters available from whichever Slayer master you talk to). - Permanently remove current - Remove your task so you can't be assigned it again, 4 types of monsters allowed, can also be re-enabled. - Buy 10k Slayer XP for X points. - Buy Ring of Slaying (8 charges) for X points. - Buy Runes for Slayer dart, a stack of 250 casts for X points. - Buy Broad arrows/Broad bolts in stacks of 250 for X points. - Getting a task for "Kalphites" will allow you to kill any Kalphite monster, the same with giants, dragons etc. - Can only recieve a minimum & maximum amount of monsters, varies depending on Slayer master.
[*]Range (incomplete) - Longbows, shortbows, Obsidian rings, Karil bows, all Crystal bows, all c'bows available. - All bolts with relevant effects have a chance of hitting. - Casting a spell whilst in ranged combat will wait until your current attack is over before casting (like RuneScape). - Crystal bows degrade. - Special attacks for weapons that use them, same effects as RuneScape. - Ranged max hit calculator, [I]almost[/I] all ranged weapons have the same maxhit as RuneScape (depending on level).
[*]Melee - All relevant melee weapons have special attacks, with corresponding special effects.
[*]Combat In General - Magic prayer halves the time you are teleblocked (if is turned on whilst someone teleblocks you). - The relevant prayers halve the damage you recieve (or 0 on NPCs). - You cannot X out, or log out of combat until 10 seconds after your last hit. - Smite will lower your opponents prayer by 25% of your damage. - Recoil ring will hit your opponent for 10% of your damage, 40 charges. - Poison, slowly decreases. - 1v1 works as it did it RuneScape. - Drops will go to the person who did the most damage, not the last hit. - Protect items, 0 skulled, 1 if you have protect item on & skulled, 4 if you're not skulled & have protect item on, 3 normally.
[*]Duel Arena - No stake limit. - All rules configurable except obstacles (pointless since the walls don't affect projectiles). - Cheat-free as far as i know (epic testing :p).
[*]Brimhaven Agility Arena - All obstacles. - There is only a set level to enter the arena, not a level per obstacle (so you can use everything). - First pillar will enable you to get a ticket on the next pillar, and recieve a ticket for every pillar tagged from then on. (same as RuneScape). - Costs to enter. - Tickets exchangable for the same items & XP as RuneScape.
[*]Barrows - Random doors. - Random brother. - All tunnel doors open & close properly. - Recieve random item/s from the chest. - Earthquake after you recieve item which will slowly kill you (to prevent chest campers). - The brothers have relevant attack effects. - Same rewards from chest as RuneScape. - The brothers will dissapear if you leave the crypt for ANY reason.
[*]Fight Pits - 2 players needed to start a game. - Viewing orb. - Winner recieves a red skull. - Tzhaar monsters spawn if the game isn't completed in X minutes. - Winner recieves Tokkul reward, amount dependant on number of killed people. - All relevant dialogue.
[*]Miscellaneous - All Jewellery teleports - Dropped items will refresh upon login, to prevent untradables being lost from disconnections. - All food and potions will heal/boost the same as RuneScape, pies/cakes change into the relevant 'pieces'. - Completely working chat privacy options. - You can click objects from far away and won't need to reclick once next to them. - Rewritten all the RS2HD-features (banking etc). - Rewrote the RS2HD event system.
[b]Credits.[/b] Here's a list of people who have helped me in some way with the development of this server, whether it be something simple such as an id, or something bigger which made a massive difference. I will update it accordingly, and thanks to everyone on the list :).
[*]Graham [*]Edu [*]Richard1992 [*]Peterbjornx [*]The Killer18 [*]Frugooscape [*]Luke132 [*]dragonkk [*]Hotyute [*]popbob [*]Palidino76 [*]Viruz3 [*]super_ [*]Vastico [*]Noobscape [*]Nathan [*]Simon [*]discardedx2 [*]brain090 [*]Josh [*]T.I[/ul]
